name: Magic trial
description:
Magic Trial

Wipe out all the elementals, choose your spells wisely. Beware of the minions. Can you past all the tests...

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • mouse for targeting, left click to charge and cast spells
  • Q and E or mouse wheel to change spell

Tools used:

  • Unity 5.4
  • Visual Studio 2015 Community edition
  • Paint.NET
  • bfxr.net
